snippet: The justice, James P. Roman, damaged the youth’s bike, cursing and threatening him, the State Commission on Judicial Conduct charged.
abstract: New York State Commission on Judicial Conduct announces James P Roman, Town Court justice in Sullivan, NY, has agreed to resign from his post; Roman confronted a teenager for stealing money from his farm stand and during altercation allegedly pushed boy and threw his bike and threatened him with baseball bat.
lead_paragraph: The justice, James P. Roman, damaged the youth’s bike, cursing and threatening him, the State Commission on Judicial Conduct charged.

headline.main: Sullivan Town Court Judge Resigns Over Tirade at Teenager
headline.print_headline: Town Judge Resigns Post Over Tirade At Teenager
